title: A Holistic Approach to Mind-Body Wellness — Loving Roots Project
author: Dr Shelley Sommerfeldt
description: There's a strong connection between the body and the mind. Our bodily systems can directly impact one another and paying close attention to all of them can result in the best outcomes and healthiest lifestyle. Strengthening both our minds and physical bodies can lead to happier and healthier lives.
